name: workshop-ci-cd
description: Practical Session: Building a CI CD Workflow  - Step 1: Create a GitHub repository.  - Step 2: Set up a simple backend app with one endpoint using express .  - Step 3: Write a test for the endpoint and run it locally using a express lib.  - Step 4: Set up a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions to automate testing and deployment choose something to deploy with.  - Step 5: Simulate a failed test by altering the code, observe the CI report, and fix the issue. - Step 6: Push the corrected code and verify pipeline success.
